-  readLinkQuality(forDeviceComplete:device:info:error:) 

Instance Method# readLinkQuality(forDeviceComplete:device:info:error:)

macOS

```
func readLinkQuality(
    forDeviceComplete controller: Any!,
    device: IOBluetoothDevice!,
    info: UnsafeMutablePointer<BluetoothHCILinkQualityInfo>!,
    error: IOReturn
)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/readLinkQuality(forDeviceComplete:device:info:error:)#parameters)

`controller`Controller object that sent this delegate message.

`device`The `IOBluetooth` device.

`info`A pointer to the info.

## [Discussion](/documentation/ObjectiveC/NSObject-swift.class/readLinkQuality(forDeviceComplete:device:info:error:)#Discussion)

This delegate gets invoked when an read link quality command complete event occurs. This could occur because you invoked it by issuing a `-readLinkQualityForDevice:` command, or someone else did from another app on the same controller.
